title: Training on Utilizing Observation Assessment Rubrics for Collaborative Learning Participation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Targeting corporate managers/leaders, aims to strengthen team-based problem-solving skills in the mathematics domain. Provides short learning modules utilizing mobile devices in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can use observational assessment rubrics to classify group participation levels into three tiers (basic/developing/proficient) during collaborative problem-solving
Learners can develop at least two actionable strategies to analyze peers' cognitive, emotional, and social engagement dimensions during math projects
Learners can operate a rubric-based feedback system combining peer and self-assessment in mobile learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
